mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_NO, MC_NO, ID, MC_REG_DATE, MC_CONTENT, MC_LIKE, MC_LIKE_ID, RNUM FROM (SELECT MOVIE_NO, MC_NO, ID, MC_REG_DATE, MC_CONTENT, MC_LIKE, MC_LIKE_ID, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_COMMENT ORDER BY MC_REG_DATE DESC) ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT MOVIE_NO, MC_NO, ID, MC_REG_DATE, MC_CONTENT, MC_LIKE, MC_LIKE_ID, RNUM FROM (SELECT MOVIE_NO, MC_NO, ID, MC_REG_DATE, MC_CONTENT, MC_LIKE, MC_LIKE_ID, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_COMMENT ORDER BY MC_LIKE DESC) ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
